      public VoteResult requestVote(int term, int candidateID, int lastLogIndex, int lastLogTerm) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Calls requestVote on the remote peer and returns the result.
      Specified by:
      requestVote in interface ConsensusModuleInterface
      Parameters:
      term - candidate’s term
      candidateID - candidate requesting vote
      lastLogIndex - index of candidate’s last log entry
      lastLogTerm - term of candidate’s last log entry
      Returns:
      Throws:
      IOException

    • appendEntries

      public AppendEntryResult appendEntries(int term, int leaderID, int prevLogIndex, int prevLogTerm, List<LogEntry> logEntries, int leaderCommit) throws IOException
      Calls appendEntries on the remote peer and returns the result.
      Specified by:
      appendEntries in interface ConsensusModuleInterface
      Parameters:
      term - leader’s term
      leaderID - so follower can redirect clients
      prevLogIndex - index of log entry immediately preceding new ones
      prevLogTerm - term of prevLogIndex entry
      logEntries - log entries to store (empty for heartbeat; may send more than one for efficiency)
      leaderCommit - leader’s commitIndex
      Returns:
      Throws:
      IOException

    • installSnapshot

      public int installSnapshot(int term, int leaderID, int lastIncludedIndex, int lastIncludedTerm, int offset, byte[] data, boolean done)
      Description copied from interface: ConsensusModuleInterface
      Invoked by the leader to send chunks of a snapshot.json to a follower. Leaders always send chunks in order
      Specified by:
      installSnapshot in interface ConsensusModuleInterface
      Parameters:
      term - leader's term
      leaderID - needed by followers to redirect clients
      lastIncludedIndex - the snapshot.json replaces all entities up through and including this Index
      lastIncludedTerm - term of the last included Index of the Log
      offset - byte offset where chunk, starting at offset
      data - raw bytes where snapshot.json chunk, starting at offset
      done - TRUE if this is the last chunk
      Returns:
      currentTerm, for leader to update itself
